subject: Re: Uploaded my favorite "Manual Radio-Sweep Conversation
author: Misty
full_text:
Hiya Debbie. I finally got a chance to listen to your files today. 
Great stuff! I could hear that as you did. Perhaps you could do a post 
on your setup for the newbies who never heard of dc6 or the ways it can 
be used.
 
They came thru pretty darn loud and clear for that one!
 
Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "misujoey" <Debbie@...> wrote:
>
> I recorded this sweeping manually and listening via DC6 "LIVE" ... 
Hope 
> you're able to hear it ..
> 
> Debbie
